mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, b.name as pn FROM t_department a LEFT JOIN t_department b ON a.pid is not null AND a.pid=b.id WHERE 1=1
AND t_department.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND t_department.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
AND t_department.is_org LIKE CONCAT('%',#{isOrg},'%')
AND t_department.pid LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pid},'%')
AND t_department.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND t_department.full_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fullName},'%')
AND t_department.location LIKE CONCAT('%',#{location},'%')
AND t_department.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{note},'%')
AND t_department.sort LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%')
AND t_department.version LIKE CONCAT('%',#{version},'%')
mapper.sql: t_department.id,t_department.`code`,t_department.is_org AS isOrg,t_department.pid,t_department.`name`,t_department.full_name AS fullName,t_department.location,t_department.note,t_department.sort,t_department.version, t_staff.id AS staffId,t_staff.dept_id AS deptId,t_staff.work_age AS workAge,t_staff.hire_date AS hireDate,t_staff.leave_date AS leaveDate,t_staff.`status`,t_staff.create_time AS createTime,t_staff.note AS staffNote
